description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Escuan Lodge, 17 Aberdeen Park, Islington, London, N5 2AP

TPO Reference:
T111– Crab Apple of MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
T112– Hawthorn of MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
T114– Beech of MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
T115– Crab Apple of MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
Elm
T116– Robinia of MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
T118– Cherry of MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977

PO Number:

T110294

Work specifications:

1 x Crab Apple (T111) as detailed in MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
Crown reduce by up to 15%
Crown thin by a maximum of 10% and remove deadwood

1 x Hawthorn (T112) as detailed in MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
Crown reduce by up to 15%
Crown thin by a maximum of 10% and remove deadwood

1 x Beech (T114) as detailed in MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
Crown thin by a maximum of 10% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear building by 2-3m
Crown lift to 4.5m above ground level.

1 x Crab Apple (T115) as detailed in MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
Crown reduce by up to 15%
Crown thin by a maximum of 10% and remove deadwood

Elm – not worthy of a TPO

1 x Robinia (T116) as detailed in MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
Remove deadwood
Remove x1 low branch to main stem
 
1 x Cherry (T119) as detailed in MILDMAY (NO.2) TPO 1977
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Reduce lateral branches by up to 2m and remove deadwood
